segments.text: I notice how the children's excitement is palpable; they’re up to something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands there, hopeful and expectant, but what about the consequences?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s amusing to watch them, yet I feel a pang of anxiety for their safety.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely oblivious to the disaster brewing at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost hear the sound of the water splashing onto the floor; it’s relentless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy’s determination to get those cookies is oddly impressive.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that stool looks so wobbly; I can’t help but cringe at the thought of him falling.
segments.speaker: PAR
